name: Smiley Face
description:
This is a 3-6 players game. There are two sides in the game. On one side players need to pick their favorite character, another side player needs to choose a boss. One side players need to utilize the combination of basic card and character skills to defeat another side.

Tabletopia link: https://tabletopia.com/playground/sb666-4xynp7/play-now
